DOC.brief_summary: To conduct randomized demonstration education trial church East Baltimore test self-help , minimal intervention compare intensive physical activity intervention .
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : The study fill exist gap examine culturally sensitive physical activity intervention conduct community set associate increased daily energy expenditure African American woman -- group woman sedentary risk health problem regular physical activity provide benefit . DESIGN NARRATIVE : An evaluation conduct effectiveness six-month moderate-intensity physical activity intervention increase total daily energy expenditure sedentary African-American woman age 50 70 year . The goal intervention increase total daily energy expenditure 150 kilocalorie per day time spend moderate-intensity physical activity 30 minute per day . Effects increase physical activity select cardiovascular risk factor ( e.g. , peak oxygen uptake , blood pressure , HDL cholesterol , serum insulin plasma glucose ) also determine . Six church randomize intensive minimal intervention status , 33 woman per church recruit , total 100 woman condition . The physical activity intervention consist twice-weekly aerobics class conduct church additional group-and home-based programming . Volunteer lay leader train neighborhood exercise specialist supplement certified aerobics instructor conduct intervention . The study completion date list record obtain `` End Date '' enter Protocol Registration Results System ( PRS ) record .
